flavorText: They found themselves alive again, still bearing their mortal wounds.

foreignData.flavorText: Sie stellten fest, dass sie plötzlich wieder lebten, obwohl sie immer noch ihre tödlichen Wunden hatten.
foreignData.name: Teuer erkaufte Neubelebung
foreignData.text: Jeder Spieler bringt alle Kreaturenkarten aus seinem Friedhof mit einer -1/-1-Marke ins Spiel zurück.

foreignData.flavorText: Se descubrieron nuevamente vivos, pero todavía con sus heridas mortales.
foreignData.name: Resucitación pírrica
foreignData.text: Cada jugador regresa al juego cada carta de criatura en su cementerio con un contador -1/-1 sobre ella.

foreignData.flavorText: Ils vivaient à nouveau, leurs blessures mortelles toujours béantes.
foreignData.name: Réanimation pyrrhique
foreignData.text: Chaque joueur renvoie en jeu chaque carte de créature de son cimetière avec un marqueur -1/-1 sur elle.

foreignData.flavorText: Si ritrovarono di nuovo vivi, con ancora i segni delle loro ferite mortali.
foreignData.name: Rinascita di Pirro
foreignData.text: Ogni giocatore rimette in gioco ogni carta creatura dal proprio cimitero con un segnalino -1/-1.

foreignData.flavorText: 彼らが生き返っているのに気づいたとき、負った致命傷はそのままだった。
foreignData.name: 戦舞いの蘇生
foreignData.text: 各プレイヤーは自分の墓地にある各クリーチャー・カードを、それぞれ－１/－１カウンターが１個置かれた状態で場に戻す。

foreignData.flavorText: Eles se encontraram vivos novamente, mas ainda com suas feridas mortais.
foreignData.name: Renascimento Pírrico
foreignData.text: Cada jogador devolve cada card de criatura em seu cemitério para o jogo com um marcador -1/-1.

foreignData.flavorText: Они вновь почувствовали себя живыми, но, как и прежде, смертельно израненными.
foreignData.name: Пиррово Возрождение
foreignData.text: Каждый игрок возвращает каждую карту существа из своего кладбища в игру с жетоном -1/-1 на ней.

foreignData.flavorText: 他们不但复生，死前的伤口也依旧未愈。
foreignData.name: 惨烈复生
foreignData.text: 每位牌手将其坟墓场中所有生物牌移回场上，且上面各有一个-1/-1指示物。

name: Pyrrhic Revival
originalText: Each player returns each creature card in his or her graveyard to play with a -1/-1 counter on it.

rulings.text: Pyrrhic Revival can cause creatures to be put onto the battlefield that have 0 toughness due to the -1/-1 counter from this effect. Those creatures are put right back into their owners’ graveyards as a state-based action. No spells or abilities that would remove counters or otherwise affect those creatures can be cast or activated before that happens. Still, the creatures did momentarily pop onto the battlefield, so any relevant triggered abilities (including their own enters-the-battlefield or leaves-the-battlefield abilities) will trigger. They’ll be put on the stack after state-based actions are checked.

text: Each player returns each creature card from their graveyard to the battlefield with an additional -1/-1 counter on it.
